body_text:
There's no easy way to pass in the isCloning prop from the route, except through the route prop (route.isCloning). If we don't include this route: pt.object business, react throws warnings that the propType isn't defined.
if I could find a simpler way to get to the isCloning prop then this wouldn't be necessary - any ideas?
body:
There's no easy way to pass in the `isCloning` prop from the route, except through the `route` prop (`route.isCloning`). If we don't include this `route: pt.object` business, react throws warnings that the propType isn't defined.

if I could find a simpler way to get to the `isCloning` prop then this wouldn't be necessary - any ideas?
body_html:
There's no easy way to pass in the isCloning prop from the route, except through the route prop (route.isCloning). If we don't include this route: pt.object business, react throws warnings that the propType isn't defined.

if I could find a simpler way to get to the isCloning prop then this wouldn't be necessary - any ideas?
